name: NDMJOB
short_description:
NDMJOB is a NDMP-compatible backup/restore package, reference
implementation, and conformance test. NDMP is an open protocol
for network based backup enabling multi-vendor backup solutions.

Please see http://www.ndmp.org for more information.
